synopsis.text: Mizuno Haruka and Murakami Naoki, two final-year high school students, find themselves intertwined in a tale of love and academia as they navigate the challenges of university entrance exams. As the pressure mounts, Naoki discovers himself falling deeply in love with Haruka, adding a romantic layer to their shared journey. The anime, based on Tatsuya Egawa's long-running manga 'Golden Boy', beautifully captures the essence of young love amidst the backdrop of academic rigor.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
